CustomField.description: If checked, the default action will be to send the UPS Email notification to the recipient. For return shipments, it will be sent to the "Return From" address.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the default action will be to send the UPS Email notification to the recipient. For return shipments, it will be sent to the "Return From" address.
CustomField.label: Send Email Notification To Recipient
